ground_truth: Harry gives a shrug of his head, as David's lips part, his gaze thoughtful. The young politician blinks his deep-set eyes and shifts his heartbroken gaze, his expression wistful, as he stares across the warehouse. David presses his lips together. Later, they follow a covered outdoor walkway and stop at a door, where Harry takes hold of a side door's knob. Passing through the door, they enter a spacious white gallery with paintings on the walls. The human obeys, agog. In an upper gallery, a partial dinosaur skeleton hangs from the ceiling. Peter, on an upper level overlooking the dinosaur, Harry leads David to another door, and David puts his hand on the agent's shoulder. Harry leads him into a service tunnel with pipework along the walls, and David obeys, gawking at the jarring change in location, and follows his guide down the damp corridor. They follow an enormous insulated pipe then descend a short flight of steps, as Harry crosses the floor and climbs a steep flight of steps to a rust-eaten door. Turning the knob counterclockwise, he opens it. They glimpse a stoic figure and a fedora passing by as he shuts the door behind him, and David gazes after him. Now Elise arrives at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio and faces a receptionist. Harry returns to the pumping station with a briefcase and leads David to a service junction where a cinderblock worktable awaits them. He takes two ledgers from the briefcase, handing one to David. As they confer, we watch Elise dance. Elsie drops warily onto her buttocks and lies down, resting her hands on her abdomen. Harry smiles to himself and sets his plan book down, while David stares at him. Pursing his lips, he shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod. His lips pressed tight, Harry takes a deep breath and nods, as David regards impensively. Elise steps from the dance studio into the night air and makes her way down the sidewalk. At dawn, a thick blanket of lead gray clouds passes over the city. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise, raindrops plummet at us, and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park. Now at the courthouse, Adrian faces a petite clerk. Clad in a flowing black halter dress, Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly. In the pumping station, Harry and David reach a spiral staircase. Harry smiles and gives David his fedora. Under the officer's kind gaze, David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath. As he climbs the spiral stairway, Harry gazes after him. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway, sprinting across a busy street where cars narrowly avoid hitting him.

The young politician blinks his deep-set eyes slowly, as if trying to clear his mind, and shifts his heartbroken gaze, his expression turning wistful as he stares across the vast expanse of the warehouse. David presses his lips together firmly, a gesture of determination or perhaps restraint. Later, they walk along a covered outdoor walkway, their footsteps echoing softly, and come to a stop at a door. Here, Harry reaches out and takes hold of the side door's knob with a firm grip. As they pass through the door, they enter a spacious white gallery, where paintings adorn the walls, each piece adding color and life to the otherwise stark space. The human, overwhelmed by the sight, obeys and follows, agog at the transformation of their surroundings. In an upper gallery, a partial dinosaur skeleton hangs from the ceiling, casting intriguing shadows. Harry guides him into a service tunnel, where pipework lines the walls, creating a stark contrast to the gallery they just left. David, still processing the jarring change in location, gawks at the industrial setting and follows his guide down the damp corridor. They continue along, following an enormous insulated pipe, then descend a short flight of steps. Harry crosses the floor with purpose and climbs a steep flight of steps to a rust-eaten door. With a deliberate motion, he turns the knob counterclockwise and opens it. As they step through, they catch a glimpse of a stoic figure in a fedora passing by, and as Harry shuts the door behind him, David gazes after the mysterious figure. Meanwhile, Elise arrives at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio and faces a receptionist, ready to engage in her own journey. Harry returns to the pumping station, carrying a briefcase, and leads David to a service junction where a cinderblock worktable awaits them. He opens the briefcase and takes out two ledgers, handing one to David. As they confer over the ledgers, we watch Elise dance, her movements fluid and expressive. Elise then drops warily onto her buttocks and lies down, resting her hands on her abdomen, a moment of vulnerability and reflection. Harry, observing the scene, smiles to himself and sets his plan book down, while David stares at him, trying to decipher his thoughts. Pursing his lips, David shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod, acknowledging the unspoken understanding between them. With his lips pressed tight, Harry takes a deep breath and nods in return, as David regards him impensively, contemplating the weight of their actions. Elise steps out from the dance studio into the cool night air and makes her way down the sidewalk, her mind perhaps still lingering on the dance. At dawn, a thick blanket of lead gray clouds passes over the city, casting a somber mood. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise, raindrops plummet towards us, and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park, a scene of solitude and reflection. Now at the courthouse, Adrian faces a petite clerk, ready to address whatever business brought him there. Clad in a flowing black halter dress, Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly, her thoughts perhaps elsewhere. In the pumping station, Harry and David reach a spiral staircase. Harry smiles warmly and gives David his fedora, a gesture of trust and encouragement. Under the officer's kind gaze, David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath, steeling himself for what lies ahead. As he climbs the spiral stairway, Harry gazes after him, a silent supporter. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble, quickly regaining his balance, and dashes down a rainy alleyway, his feet splashing through puddles. He sprints across a busy street, narrowly avoiding cars that honk and swerve to miss him, driven by urgency and determination.

Harry returns to the pumping station with a briefcase and leads David to a service junction where a cinderblock worktable awaits them. He takes two ledgers from the briefcase handing one to David. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. As they confer we watch Elise dance. Elsie drops warily onto her buttocks and lies down resting her hands on her abdomen. Harry smiles to himself and sets his plan book down while David stares at him. Pursing his lips he shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod. His lips pressed tight. Harry takes a deep breath and nods as David regards impensively. Elise steps from the dance studio into the night air and makes her way down the sidewalk. At dawn a thick blanket of lead gray clouds passes over the city. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise raindrops plummet at us and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park. Now at the courthouse Adrian faces a petite clerk Clad in a flowing black halter dress. Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly. In the pumping station Harry and David reach a spiral staircase. Harry smiles and gives David his fedora. Under the officer's kind gaze. David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath As he climbs the spiral stairway Harry gazes after him. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway sprinting across a busy street where cars narrowly avoid hitting him.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Harry gives a shrug of his head as David's lips part his gaze thoughtful. The young politician blinks his deepset eyes and shifts his heartbroken gaze his expression wistful as he stares across the warehouse. David presses his lips together. Later they follow a covered outdoor walkway and stop at a door where Harry takes hold of a side door's knob. Passing through the door they enter a spacious white gallery with paintings on the walls. The human obeys agog. In an upper gallery a partial dinosaur skeleton hangs from the ceiling. Peter on an upper level overlooking the dinosaur. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise raindrops plummet at us and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park. Now at the courthouse Adrian faces a petite clerk Clad in a flowing black halter dress. Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly. In the pumping station Harry and David reach a spiral staircase. Harry smiles and gives David his fedora. Under the officer's kind gaze. David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath As he climbs the spiral stairway Harry gazes after him. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway sprinting across a busy street where cars narrowly avoid hitting him.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Harry gives a shrug of his head as David's lips part his gaze thoughtful. The young politician blinks his deepset eyes and shifts his heartbroken gaze his expression wistful as he stares across the warehouse. David presses his lips together. Later they follow a covered outdoor walkway and stop at a door where Harry takes hold of a side door's knob. Under the officer's kind gaze. David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath As he climbs the spiral stairway Harry gazes after him. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway sprinting across a busy street where cars narrowly avoid hitting him.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Barney tosses a twitch of his elbow, as Claire's nostrils flare, her grin mischievous. The ancient historian squints his sunken cheeks and twists his jubilant grin, his demeanor enthusiastic, as he glances across the shipyard. Claire clicks her fingers apart. Later, they wander through a congested indoor bazaar and pause at a gate, where Barney grabs hold of a side gate's latch. Sliding through the gate, they step into a cramped red aviary with murals on the floor. The feline complies, puzzled. In a lower aviary, a full giraffe sculpture dangles from the floor. Oliver, on a lower tier overlooking the giraffe, Barney guides Claire to another gate, and Claire places her foot on the artist's elbow. Barney directs her into a heating duct with cables along the ceiling, and Claire complies, marveling at the thrilling shift in scenery, and trails her escort through the dry causeway. They trail a tiny uninsulated cable then ascend a long ladder of rungs, as Barney scuttles the ceiling and slides up a shallow ladder of rungs to a silver-painted gate. Twisting the latch clockwise, he shuts it. They spy a giggling creature and a parka floating by as he closes the gate behind her, and Claire gawks after her. Now Lori appears at the Maple Leaf Music Venue and challenges a librarian. Barney returns to the brewing station with a guitar case and guides Claire to a hardware intersection where a wooden planter greets them. He plucks two scrolls from the guitar case, tossing one to Claire. As they quarrel, we witness Lori sing. Lori hops cautiously onto her knees and sits up, resting her feet on her chest. Barney grins to himself and lays his sketchbook down, while Claire glares at her. Smirking with her teeth, she pivots her ears and gives a sly wink. Her teeth clenched tight, Barney inhales deeply and winks, as Claire observes absently. Lori strolls from the music venue into the dim room and creeps her path up the stairwell. At dusk, a thin layer of bright golden sunshine drifts under the forest. As we glance in the sky of the Adjustment Bureau low lake, snowflakes drift toward us, and snow envelops Barney's platform in Central Garden Plaza. Now at the stadium, Marcus confronts a bulky guard. Wrapped in a tattered blue jumpsuit, Lori enters with a sibling and frowns loosely. In the brewing station, Barney and Claire approach a crooked escalator. Barney grins and tosses Claire her parka. Under the vendor's cold glare, Claire wraps the parka under her chest and takes a shaky pause. As she slides the crooked escalator, Barney glares after her. Claire tumbles into a window with a graceful leap and strolls into a sunlit field, darting across a silent meadow where boulders stay oblivious of grazing.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Harry and David, a young politician, journey through a gallery, marveling at a dinosaur skeleton. Harry leads David into a service tunnel, navigating corridors that change drastically in appearance. They reach a cinderblock worktable where Harry gives David a ledger, and Elise, a dancer, appears at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio. Harry, while contemplating his plan, sees Elise dance, and David watches thoughtfully. Rain falls over the city as Harry sits in Madison Square Park. Elise, in a black halter dress, arrives at the courthouse. Harry gives David his fedora, offering encouragement. David, donning the fedora, ascends a spiral staircase and bursts into a rainy alley, narrowly dodging traffic.
